de.unlixx.runpng.util

Class ARGB

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.util.ARGB

  • public class ARGB
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of an ARGB-pixel with frequency and a relocation index for palette optimization.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int alpha 
      int argb 
      int blue 
      int green

      (package private) int m_nRelocation 
      int red 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ARGB(int nARGB)
      Constructor for a single ARGB-pixel with a frequency value of 0 and no relocation (-1).
      ARGB(int nARGB, int nFrequency)
      Constructor for a single ARGB-pixel with a given frequency and no relocation (-1).
